Command *wiz_resurrect*
************************

Documentation for the wiz_resurrect command in */cmds/wiz/resurrect.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``resurrect <playername>``
 |  ``resurrect me!myself``

Brings a dead player back to life
